abstract: Citigroup, Bank of America, Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs will report earnings, and the E.U. is expected to pass laws aimed at reducing nations’ vulnerability to the problems of their big banks.
snippet: Citigroup, Bank of America, Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs will report earnings, and the E.U. is expected to pass laws aimed at reducing nations’ vulnerability to the problems of their big banks.
lead_paragraph: MORE BANKS TO REPORT FIRST-QUARTER EARNINGS

headline.main: Big Banks’ Earnings Reports, and E.U. to Act on Bank Laws
